definition: to roam about/to wander without a home
to roam far and wide (idiom)/to travel the world
to roam far and wide/to drift with the wind

sentences.english: 9-2. In those days wandering minstrels were welcome everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 當時，浪跡四方的吟遊歌手到處受歡迎。

sentences.english: I must go down to the seas again, to the vagrant Gypsy life.
sentences.chinese: 我必須重回大海的懷抱，回到浪跡天涯的無拘生活。

sentences.english: His library displayed miscellanea of mementos from different parts of the world, a lifetime of traveling.
sentences.chinese: 他書房裏滿是浪跡天涯時，蒐羅來的世界各地紀念品。

sentences.english: Shi led a wandering life for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 很長一段時間石濤都在過着浪跡天涯的生活。

sentences.english: I must wander again all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 我必須再一次浪跡天涯。

sentences.english: He travelled the land in search of worthy foes.
sentences.chinese: 他浪跡江湖，尋找實力相當的對手。

sentences.english: And lonely travelers wandering free, Will find their way back home with me.
sentences.chinese: 還有那浪跡天涯的遊子，我會指引他找到回家的路。

sentences.english: End of the World traces a pot of rover Ruhou hard, you go after the wine warm memories of lean thinking.
sentences.chinese: 一壺飄泊浪跡天涯難入喉，你走之後酒暖回憶思念瘦。

sentences.english: In those days wandering minstrels were welcome everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 當時，浪跡天涯的吟遊歌手到處受歡迎。

sentences.english: She knew I'd drifted since childhood.
sentences.chinese: 飛雪知道，我從小浪跡江湖。

sentences.english: He took the midnight train goin' anywhere…
sentences.chinese: 有一天，他乘上了午夜的列車，浪跡天涯。

sentences.english: We compare with wave vestige the person of the limits of the earth, just having another a material of outer shell.
sentences.chinese: 我們和浪跡天涯的人相比，只是多了一個物質的外殼。

sentences.english: In your despair you wander about vainly seeking contentment in empty pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 絕望中，你浪跡天涯，在虛無的快樂中尋找幸福。

sentences.english: She is gone forever. Who is going to be roaming this tiny planet with me for the rest of my life?
sentences.chinese: 她已經遠去。我的餘生裏，誰將會陪伴我浪跡天涯呢？

sentences.english: Do not miss tasteless roaming alone took a gourd ladle thoughts of water.
sentences.chinese: 盡不知思念無味浪跡天涯獨取一瓢思念黃河水。

sentences.english: He traveled the land in search of worthy foes.
sentences.chinese: 他浪跡江湖尋找真正的對手。

definition: homeless and miserable/forced to leave home and wander from place to place/to live as a refugee
Milky Way/also called 銀河|银河[Yin2 he2]
ten thousand crags and torrents (idiom); the trials and tribulations of a long journey/a long and difficult road
to visit places famous for their scenery
an estranged person/sb who is alienated/people far from home
past events/relics from a former age/ruins
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
